pullRequest.title: [RW-4563][RISK=NO] Minor changes to registration steps screen
pullRequest.bodyText:
Following changes were done


Data user Agreement is changed “Data User Code of Conduct” ( Just the title and url assumption the file name etc changes will be done by 4561 if not i can change it here)


the order for registration is now Two factor -> ERA Commons -> Compliance Training ->  Data Code of Conduct


All external links (NIH, Ethics etc) from registration will open in a new tab


Some text and description changes




PR checklist

 This PR meets the Acceptance Criteria in the JIRA story
 The JIRA story has been moved to Dev Review
 This PR includes appropriate unit tests
 I have run and tested this change locally
 If this includes an API change, I have updated the appropriate Swagger definitions and notified API consumers
 If this includes a new feature flag, I have created and linked new JIRA tickets to (a) turn on the feature flag and (b) remove it later

commit.message: Text and some other changes to registration page

nodes.bodyText: Add "User" here: Data User Code of Conduct
restore the italics to All of Us
We should rename these 2 to better match the new title
we should change the name of the component, to match
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -71,9 +71,9 @@ const routes: Routes = [
         component: HomepageComponent,
         data: {title: 'Homepage'},
       }, {
-        path: 'data-use-agreement',
+        path: 'data-code-of-conduct',
         component: DataUseAgreementComponent,

nodes.bodyText: I know this matches the mocks, but I wonder if "Connect" would be a better choice for this button.

commit.message: update all angular component to DataUserCodeOfConduct rather than DataUseAgreement
PR Comments Chgange key and button text

nodes.bodyText: Looking good!  I'd like one last change: update this line so it doesn't refer to a "data use agreement"

commit.message: Change completed key to match data user code of conduct
